DataElement.preferredName: Disposition Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Qualifier Data Value Clinical Trial Protocol Assignment Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The text field specifying the name of the subject's protocol assignment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disposition Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Qualifier Data Value Clinical Trial Protocol Assignment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the disposition domain._The value of the data modifier._A document that describes the objective(s), design, methodology, statistical considerations, and organization of a trial. The protocol usually also gives the background and rationale for the trial, but these could be provided in other protocol referenced documents. Throughout the ICH GCP Guideline the term protocol refers to protocol and protocol amendments. NOTE: Present usage can refer to any of three distinct entities: 1) the plan (i.e., content) of a protocol, 2) the protocol document, and 3) a series of tests or treatments (as in oncology). [ICH E6 Glossary]_An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the disposition domain.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/1/21 TL transferred ownership from CTEP to PMI. TL curated for PMI CDISC harmonization.
